data.name: Demon
data.description:
Demon

Units:
+12% damage
+30% buy cost

Buildings:
+15% HP/sec regeneration

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage
+10% cost

Traits: Extremely powerful with no real weaknesses. Demons reign in their realm virtually unchalanged. Luckily this is not their realm and keeping dimensional portals open for the supplylines is very expensive.

Difficulty: Beginer

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+20% building HP regeneration
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Vampiric Aura
auras.description:
20% melee lifesteal
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Corruption Aura
auras.description:
-6 unit armor
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Dark Lord Himself [Q]
bonuses.description:
Archimonde replaces Kazzak

Special Unit (Ranged)
-20% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Finger of Death (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage, 6-12 units
(affects organic units only)
Dark Portal (Summoning Spell)
summons up to 3-8 random units
Intimidation Aura (Disable Aura)
10-22% attack rate reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Rain of Chaos (Summoning Spell)
summons 3 Infernals for 30-90 sec

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Legion's Vanguard [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Vile Blood
+1 level of Devour Magic

Reduces spell damage to Felguard, Succubus, Diabolist and Fel Stalker by 20%. Increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

units.name: Fel Lord
units.description:
Melee Unit
Strong Vs Ranged Unit
Weak Vs Spellcaster

bonuses.name: Orb of Corruption [E]
bonuses.description:
Increases Felguard, Succubus and Diabolist attack rate by 5% and allows them to reduce their target's armor by 1/3/5/7/9 for 20 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)
(can be upgraded in this building)

Type: Anti Armor

bonuses.name: Eredar Witch [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Shadow Step

Eredar Witch replaces Diabolist
Spellcaster
-10% attack rate
+4 damage
+50 MP
Abilities:
Finger of Death (Damage Spell) (Ground)
(25/50/75/100 damage to 3 units)
Finger of Death (Damage Spell) (Air)
(200/250/300/350 damage)
(affects 2 Air units)
Upgrades used:
Fel Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Demonsteel Armor
Shadow Step

Idea by: Matthias Rehn

Type: Magic Damage / Anti Air

units.name: Eredar Witch
units.description:
Spellcaster
Strong Vs Melee Unit
Weak Vs Ranged Unit

(does not affect Special unit)

skills.name: Bladestorm - [Level 2]
skills.description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around the Hero, rendering him immune to magic and dealing 110 damage per second to nearby enemy land units.
Lasts 5 seconds.

bonuses.name: Lost Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Lost Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

bonuses.description:

spells.description:

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero
This is not a Hero game. Sometimes you need to stomp your foot down and show those scum their place.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+10% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.description:

Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.

Cooldown: 600 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Soul Harvest
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: heal after a kill
Affects: Felguard, Succubus and Diabolist
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: heals 75 HP
Lv2: heals 150 HP
Lv3: heals 225 HP
Lv4: heals 300 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Vile Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage over time in 150 AoE
Affects: Felguard, Succubus and Diabolist
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 8 damage/sec
Lv2: 16 damage/sec
Lv3: 24 damage/sec
Lv4: 32 damage/sec

towerUpgrades.name: Feedback
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: burns mana on each attack
Affects: Fel Stalker
(burns half amount to Heroes)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: burns 10 mana
Lv2: burns 20 mana
Lv3: burns 30 mana
Lv4: burns 40 mana

towerUpgrades.name: Shadow Step
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: phase shift ability
Affects: Succubus and Diabolist

Lv1: 60 sec cooldown
Lv2: 45 sec cooldown
Lv3: 30 sec cooldown
Lv4: 15 sec cooldown

towerUpgrades.name: Fear Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces enemy damage
Affects: Fel Stalker
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: -10% damage in 400 AoE
Lv2: -20% damage in 500 AoE
Lv3: -30% damage in 600 AoE
Lv4: -40% damage in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Skin
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and damage to melee attacker
Affects: Fel Stalker
(affects summoned Infernals)

Lv1: +2 armor, 10 damage
Lv2: +4 armor, 20 damage
Lv3: +6 armor, 30 damage
Lv4: +8 armor, 40 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Chains
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's speed
Affects: Felbat and Chaos Tower
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: -10% attack, -5% move for 6 sec
Lv2: -20% attack, -10% move for 8 sec
Lv3: -30% attack, -15% move for 10 sec
Lv4: -40% attack, -20% move for 12 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Devour Magic
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: dispels buffs in an area
Affects: Fel Stalker and Felbat
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 100 AoE, heals 25 HP per buff
Lv2: 125 AoE, heals 50 HP per buff
Lv3: 150 AoE, heals 75 HP per buff
Lv4: 175 AoE, heals 100 HP per buff

spells.name: Devour Magic (Lv1)
spells.description: Consumes all magical buffs from units in an area. Each unit that is devoured of magic gives 75 hit points.

towerUpgrades.name: Soul Echo
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage on death
Affects: Your Heroes
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 250 damage, 2 sec stun
Lv2: 500 damage, 3 sec stun
Lv3: 750 damage, 4 sec stun
Lv4: 1000 damage, 5 sec stun

t1spell.name: Fel Fire [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Rain of Fel [X]
t2spell.description:

Each wave deals 250 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Pit Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
War Stomp (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4 sec stun
(250-400 area of effect)

Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)

Fel Infusion (Self Spell)
18-30 HP/s regeneration
(when not under attack)

Inferno (Summoning Spell)
summons Infernal for 30-90 sec

heroes.name: Dreadlord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Carrion Swarm (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)

30-60 damage, 10-20% lifesteal

Vampiric Aura (Support Aura)
28-40% melee lifesteal

Bat Swarm (Damage Spell)
turn into 6-12 bats for 10 sec

heroes.name: Fel Fire Elemental

2-8 armor reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)

30-60 damage/sec for 10 sec
(600-900 area of effect)
